org.osgilab.testing.commons.assertions
Class FilterAssert

java.lang.Object
  org.osgilab.testing.commons.assertions.OSGiAssert
      org.osgilab.testing.commons.assertions.FilterAssert

public class FilterAssert
extends OSGiAssert

A set of OSGi Filter specific assertion methods useful for writing tests.

Before use it should be initialized OSGiAssert.init(org.osgi.framework.BundleContext)

Version:
1.0
Author:
dmytro.pishchukhin
See Also:
AssertionError, OSGiAssert

Method Detail

assertFilterCorrect

public static void assertFilterCorrect(java.lang.String filter)
Asserts that given filter is correct. If it not as expected AssertionError without a message is thrown

Parameters:
filter - filter

assertFilterCorrect

public static void assertFilterCorrect(java.lang.String message,
                                       java.lang.String filter)
Asserts that given filter is correct. If it not as expected AssertionError is thrown with the given message

Parameters:
message - message
filter - filter

public static void assertFilterIncorrect(java.lang.String filter)
Asserts that given filter is incorrect. If it not as expected AssertionError without a message is thrown

Parameters:
filter - filter
